Categorize this IT Ticket:

activation failures sent monday july re activation failures small addition previous while was able activate past work anymore would usually use get product key remove add back use act parameter get activate saying cannot reach server window kind regards engineer en sent july activation failures dear please log ticket for relevant guessing investigate why activate properly newly built only noticed last week thought was one off issue but seems for any building result same when open any program get product activation failed have go manually try activate through remove product key add back then activate guess would be during build link server gets broken somewhere or might be totally off kind regards engineer en
